reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Provide bread, support livelihoods and preserve livestock.

description.narrative: Provide bread to families in Syria, both to besieged areas and in the north of Syria.

• Provide free bread to poor, affected and displaced families inside Syria. • Contribute to the general food security in Syria and provide an essential part of the most important components of the food of the Syrian people. • Alleviate the financial burden on Syrian families in providing their food. • Ensure that traders do not control the bread of the main families (bread) and not monopoly and raise prices. • Contributing to the preservation and reproduction of livestock in Syria. • Provide a stable source of livelihood for poor families to help them become self-reliant and earn a living. • Increasing the number of livestock and ensuring the availability of milk and meat products at affordable prices for families.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
